name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Kenneth MORGAN

judges: Before NIX, C.J. and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
CASTILLE, J., dissents and would reach the merits of the case.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Kenneth MORGAN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
CASTILLE, J., dissents and would reach the merits of the case.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph J. Mittleman, Dennis C. McAndrews, Media, for Com.
Patrick J. Connors, Media, William E. Ruane, Lansdowne, for K. Morgan.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 295
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Kenneth MORGAN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 8, 1994.
Decided Dec. 30, 1994.
Joseph J. Mittleman, Dennis C. McAndrews, Media, for Com.
Patrick J. Connors, Media, William E. Ruane, Lansdowne, for K. Morgan.
Before NIX, C.J. and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
